name: ICEwebADF: ICEfaces + ESRI ArcGIS WebADF
short_description: Integrate the power of the fully AJAX enabled technology of ICEfaces into the framework of the ESRI WebADF. No need to code in Javascript or to handle XML communication to build AJAX functionalities. OnlineDemo: http://www2.pch.etat.lu/pchViewer
